Variable definition: Weights to adjust for undercounting of all-cause mortalities in Sabah
Categorical describing death either in Peninsular Malaysia or Sabah/ Sarawak
Ethnicity; i) Bumiputera Malay, ii) Bumiputera non-Malay, iii) Chinese, iv) Indian, v) Others
Day of death (numeric value ranging from 1-31)
Month of death (numeric value ranging from 1-12)
Year of death (numeric value ranging from 2016-2021)

Categorical: i) Perlis, ii) Kedah, iii) Pulau Pinang, iv) Perak, v) Selangor, vi) Negeri Sembilan, vii) Melaka, viii) Johor, ix) Pahang, x) Terengganu, xi) Kelantan, xii) Sabah, xiii) Sarawak, xiv) Wilayah Perseketuan Kuala Lumpur, xv)  Wilayah Perseketuan Putrajaya, xvi) Wilayah Perseketuan Labuan, and xvii) Malaysia
Death certified by: i) Medical practitioner, ii) Police etc.
Cause of death in free text
ICD-10 code for cause of death
Age-grp; defined as i)<5, ii)6-18, iii) 19-59, iv)>60
Categorical; if death from RTA (1) or not-RTA (0)
